content: **izi the fly** we flies aren t the most loved creatures in the world yet you decided to make me out of a ball of yarn or maybe even some leftover pieces of yarn incredible as a sign of my appreciation i will try and do better than my fly-colleagues i won t bother you i won t sit on your food i won t zoom in your ear just when you re about to fall asleep i ll just sit somewhere and be cute deal **specifications** hook 3 5 mm yarn dk weight 60% cotton 40% acrylic scheepjes softfun 2628 charcoal scheepjes softfun 2412 snow scheepjes stonewashed 805 blue apatite stuffing polyester fiberfill accessories safety eyes 12 mm
